hero.description: A lightweight and flexible SCSS Module-based design system. Build beautiful websites quickly with systematic design tokens and various components.

features.title: SCSS Module-based Design System
features.description: A design system that allows you to implement beautiful UI with just HTML and SCSS. It provides systematic design tokens such as colors, spacing, and typography, with a flexible structure that can be used with various frameworks.

performance.title: Lightweight & Fast
performance.description: Built with pure SCSS for a small bundle size and fast performance without runtime overhead.

tokens.title: Systematic Design Tokens
tokens.description: Build consistent UI with design system functions for colors, spacing, typography, radius, and more.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode Support
darkMode.description: Built-in support for light/dark modes with warm tone settings for an optimized user experience.

responsive.title: Responsive Grid System
responsive.description: Flexible layout system that automatically adapts to PC(12), Tablet(6), and Mobile(4) grids for all devices.

api.title: Powerful SCSS Function System
api.description: Use design tokens with intuitive functions like color(), s(), r(). Build a consistent design system within your team and customize easily.

components.title: Rich UI Component Library
components.description: Essential components for web development including buttons, form elements, tables, tabs, and more. CSS class-based architecture allows free customization and extension.

cta.title: Support Podo UI
cta.description: Support the open-source Podo UI project with a Star on GitHub. Let's build it together so more people can use it conveniently!
